name: nowheelleftbehind
description: Customize your car and leave no wheel behind!

scripts.optimize: npm run optimize:js && npm run optimize:css
scripts.copy:development: npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:fonts
scripts.copy:production: npm run copy:scripts && npm run copy:html && npm run copy:icons && npm run copy:fonts
scripts.build:development: npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:development
scripts.build:production: npm run sass:generate && npm run copy:production && npm run optimize
scripts.watch: npm run watch:scripts & npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:html
